name: Downhill Pro Racer
description:
REAL DOWNHILL RIDING
Downhill Pro Racer is a Downhill mountain biking racing simulator. You know DH. It is a fast paced, risk it all race against the clock down the most dangerous natural tracks.
The connection between the rider, the bike and the terrain is essential: one mistake and you are offline into some gnarly rocks.


CONTROL YOUR BIKE
Race down realistic DH tracks while maintaining full control of your bike with controls for braking, jumping, shifting the rider's weight or doing manuals. Follow the lines you previously set to avoid obstacles that can make you crash, and keep your speed high over the turns and technical sections.


PHYSICS BASED WHIPS
In DHPR, when the bike is in the air control is just as important as when the wheels touch the ground. You will be able to whip, scrub and lean your bike as you try to gain those essential tenths of a second. No more pre-animated whips, you just send it!


FEATURES
- Huge mountain environment with 5 square Km (2 Sq. Mile) with several tracks to ride.
- 3 modes: Freeride, practice runs, or race against the clock (Single player mode)
- Choose your track: Flow line (blue), Jump line (red) or World Cup race course (black)
- Realistic tracks with obstacles like slippery roots, rock gardens, wallrides and gap jumps.
- Line editor: during practice, you will be able to choose where to put your tyres, with a point to point system. You rider will attempt to ride the line, while you focus in keeping the speed in check, jumping over obstacles and positioning your body to stay in balance.
- Replay mode-.
- Tutorial mode to master the controls.
- First person view.


EARLY ACCESS GAME - MORE FEATURES TO COME
- New mountains will be added in the future, each with several tracks, including iconic ones in countries like France, Italy, USA, Canada, UK or New Zealand.
- New bikes, helmets, race kits and gear to customize your character.
- Weather affected tracks.
- Online (multiplayer) racing.
